pkgmetadata.longdescription: python-tempestconf==================Overview--------python-tempestconf will automatically generate the tempest configurationbased on your cloud.- Free software: Apache license- Documentation: https://docs.opendev.org/openinfra/python-tempestconf/latest/- Source: https://opendev.org/openinfra/python-tempestconf- Bugs: https://storyboard.openstack.org/#!/project/912- Release notes: https://docs.opendev.org/openinfra/python-tempestconf/latest/releasenotes
